trans-unit.source: The type of the key of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo da chave de <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.

trans-unit.source: The type of the values in the <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo dos valores em <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of objects that have a common key.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos que têm uma chave comum.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> is an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> that additionally has a key.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> é um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> Além disso, que tem uma chave.

trans-unit.source: The key represents the attribute that is common to each value in the <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>.
trans-unit.target: A chave representa o atributo que é comum a cada valor de <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>.

trans-unit.source: The values of an <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> are accessed much as the elements of an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> are accessed.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de uma <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> são acessados bem como os elementos de um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> são acessados.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can access the values by using a `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic loop to iterate through the <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode acessar os valores usando um `foreach` no Visual c# ou `For Each` in Visual Basic para iterar por meio de <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Example section contains a code example that shows you how to access both the key and the values of an <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object.
trans-unit.target: A seção de exemplo contém um exemplo de código que mostra como acessar a chave e os valores de uma <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> type is used by the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%2A> standard query operator methods, which return a sequence of elements of type <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> tipo é usado pelo <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%2A> métodos de operador de consulta padrão, que retornam uma sequência de elementos do tipo <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to work with an <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como trabalhar com um <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objeto.

trans-unit.source: In this example, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29> is called on the array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects returned by <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29> é chamado em matriz de <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objetos retornados pelo <xref:System.Type.GetMembers%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29> groups the objects based on the value of their <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29> agrupa os objetos com base no valor de suas <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Each unique value for <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A> in the array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects becomes a key for a new <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object, and the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects that have that key form the <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object's sequence of values.
trans-unit.target: Cada valor exclusivo de <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.MemberType%2A> na matriz de <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objetos torna-se uma chave para um novo <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objeto e o <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objetos que têm que formam a chave de <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> sequência do objeto de valores.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%2A> method is called on the sequence of <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objects to obtain just the first <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.First%2A> método é chamado na sequência de <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objetos para obter apenas os primeiros <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example then outputs the key of the <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object and the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A> property of each value in the <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object's sequence of values.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo, em seguida, gera a chave do <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objeto e o <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.Name%2A> propriedade de cada valor no <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> sequência do objeto de valores.

trans-unit.source: Notice that to access an <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object's sequence of values, you simply use the <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> variable itself.
trans-unit.target: Observe que para acessar um <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> sequência do objeto de valores, basta usar o <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> variável em si.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave do <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.

trans-unit.source: The key of the <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.
trans-unit.target: A chave do <see cref="T:System.Linq.IGrouping`2" />.

trans-unit.source: The key of an <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> represents the attribute that is common to each value in the <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>.
trans-unit.target: A chave de um <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> representa o atributo que é comum a cada valor de <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602.Key%2A> property to label each <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object in a sequence of <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602.Key%2A> propriedade para rotular cada <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objeto em uma sequência de <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29> method is used to obtain a sequence of <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Linq.Enumerable.GroupBy%60%602%28System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%7B%60%600%7D%2CSystem.Func%7B%60%600%2C%60%601%7D%29> método é usado para obter uma sequência de <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` in Visual C# or `For Each` in Visual Basic loop then iterates through each <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> object, outputting its key and the number of values it contains.
trans-unit.target: O `foreach` no Visual c# ou `For Each` no Visual Basic loop itera cada <xref:System.Linq.IGrouping%602> objeto, gerando a saída de sua chave e o número de valores que ele contém.
